items.sentence: Tom said he was going to write a letter to Mary.
Tom said he was having dinner with Mary tonight.
Tom said he was just interested in helping Mary.
Tom said he was planning to get smashed tonight.
Tom said he was planning to hitchhike to Boston.
I can\'t remember exactly where I parked my car.
I can\'t remember the last time I saw Tom smile.
I can\'t sing very well and neither can my wife.
Tom told me that he didn\'t know how to do that.
Have you noticed that we have mice in the house?
